metadata.title: RX Family: Does Renesas provide a design guide for oscillation circuits?

sections.content:
Question:
Does Renesas provide a design guide for oscillation circuits?
Answer:
Yes, we provide it. Please use the Design Guide for Main Clock Circuit and Sub-Clock Circuit (R01AN7202EJ).
Suitable Products
RX Family
